name: decopin-cli
description: TypeScript-first CLI builder with lazy loading architecture

scripts.build: tsc && bun run build:app && bun run build:prod
scripts.dev:build-all: bun run build && bun run build:app
scripts.dev:regen: bunx tsx src/cli.ts build --app-dir app --output-dir examples --cli-name cli --verbose
scripts.test:integration: bun run build && bun run build:app && bun run dev:regen && bun test test/integration/
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run clean && bun run build:prod && bun test --bail

author: yuyakinjo
